feed.title: CTV Meeting #9 Reminder + Agenda (Tuesday, May 17th, 12:00 PT / 7PM UTC)

entry.title: CTV Meeting #9 Reminder + Agenda (Tuesday, May 17th, 12:00 PT / 7PM UTC)
entry.summary: Developers are reminded of the regularly scheduled CTV Meeting which will be held tomorrow at 12:00 Pacific Time in ##ctv-bip-review in Libera. The agenda for the meeting will be an open forum for discussion guided by the participants. Rusty's OP_TX and Adding OP_CAT / CSFS will be discussed minimally. Participants can propose meeting topics in advance through IRC to aid in allocating time for things that they would like to have discussed.
